com.iota.iri.utils

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iota.iri.utils.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts between different representations of trytes, bytes, trits and numbers.

    The IOTA protocol is represented in Trits and Trytes, while data is stored and broadcast in Bytes. This class is used to convert between the representations.

    This class also provides additional conversion tools:

    • Converting Trits to numerical values based on Balanced ternary arithmetic
    • Converting ascii to a Tryte string

      • allocateBytesForTrits

        public static byte[] allocateBytesForTrits(int tritCount)
        Allocates a byte array large enough to fit trits, used for converting trits to bytes.
        Parameters:
        tritCount - length of trit array (to be converted)
        Returns:
        a new byte array large enough to fit trits

      • bytes

        public static void bytes(byte[] trits,
                         int srcPos,
                         byte[] dest,
                         int destPos,
                         int tritsLength)
        Converts trits array to bytes array based on NUMBER_OF_TRITS_IN_A_BYTE.
        this method will override the content of dest
        Parameters:
        trits - source trits array
        srcPos - starting position for trits
        dest - destination bytes array
        destPos - starting position for destination bytes array
        tritsLength - amount of trits to convert

      • bytes

        public static void bytes(byte[] trits,
                         byte[] dest)
        Converts trits array to bytes array.
        this method will override the content of dest
        Parameters:
        trits - source trits array
        dest - destination bytes array
        See Also:
        bytes(byte[], int, byte[], int, int)

      • getTrits

        public static void getTrits(byte[] bytes,
                            byte[] trits)
        Converts bytes array to trits array based on NUMBER_OF_TRITS_IN_A_BYTE.
        the inverse of bytes(byte[], int, byte[], int, int).
        this method will override the content of trits
        Parameters:
        bytes - source bytes array
        trits - destination trits array

      • allocateTritsForTrytes

        public static byte[] allocateTritsForTrytes(int tryteCount)
        Allocates trits (a byte array) large enough to fit trytes, used for converting trytes to trits.
        Parameters:
        tryteCount - length of tryte array (to be converted)
        Returns:
        a new byte array large enough to fit trytes

      • trits

        public static void trits(java.lang.String trytes,
                         byte[] dest,
                         int destOffset)
        Converts a tryte string to trits (bytes array) based on NUMBER_OF_TRITS_IN_A_TRYTE.
        this method will override the content of dest
        Parameters:
        trytes - source trytes string
        dest - destination trits array
        destOffset - starting position for destination bytes array

      • trytes

        public static java.lang.String trytes(byte[] trits,
                                      int offset,
                                      int size)
        Converts trits (bytes array)to a tryte string based on NUMBER_OF_TRITS_IN_A_TRYTE.
        the inverse of trits(String, byte[], int).
        Parameters:
        trits - source trits array
        offset - starting position for trits
        size - amount of trits to convert
        Returns:
        tryte string

        Returns:

      • allocatingTritsFromTrytes

        public static byte[] allocatingTritsFromTrytes(java.lang.String trytes)
        Creates a new trits array with the converted tryte string.
        should be used only for testing as it allocates memory.
        Parameters:
        trytes - source trytes string
        Returns:
        a new trit array
        See Also:
        allocatingTritsFromTrytes(String), trits(String, byte[], int)

      • longValue

        public static long longValue(byte[] trits,
                             int srcPos,
                             int size)
        Parses the trits argument as a long value, based on Balanced ternary arithmetic
        Parameters:
        trits - Array of trits to be parsed
        srcPos - Starting position in trits array
        size - Amount of trits to parse
        Returns:
        the long value represented by the trits array

      • copyTrits

        public static void copyTrits(long value,
                             byte[] destination,
                             int offset,
                             int size)
        fills a trit array with a representation of the value argument in Balanced ternary arithmetic
        Parameters:
        value - a long value
        destination - destination trit array
        offset - starting position of destination array
        size - max amount of trits to fill

      • asciiToTrytes

        public static java.lang.String asciiToTrytes(java.lang.String input)
        Converts an ASCII string into a TryteString representation.

        each ASCII character is converted to 2 Trytes.

        Parameters:
        input - ASCII string.
        Returns:
        Trytes string

      • trytesToAscii

        public static java.lang.String trytesToAscii(java.lang.String input)
        Converts a TryteString into an ASCII string representation.

        every 2 Trytes are converted to a ASCII character.

        Parameters:
        input - Trytes string
        Returns:
        ASCII string.

        public static byte[] trytesToBytes(java.lang.String input)
